channel.title: Talking to a NPC
channel.description:
I have a shop in my source and he has items i want...to access could some one tell me how or show me how to make it so when i talk to him he opens up the shop interface? thanks
Axiom

item.title: Talking to a NPC
item.dc:creator: @e_bunny e bunny
item.description:
@e_bunny wrote:

Open Up your NPCHandler.Java and Search for: WORLDMAP: (walk able places)

You’ll see something like this

/* * WORLDMAP: (walk able places) 01 - Aubury 02 - Varrock Mugger 03 - Lowe 04 - * Horvik 05 - Varrock General Store 06 - Thessalia 07 - Varrock Sword Shop * 08 - Varrock East Exit Guards 09 - Falador General Store 10 - Falador * Shield Shop 11 - Falador Mace Shop 12 - Falador Center Guards 13 - * Falador North Exit Guards 14 - Barbarian Village Helmet Shop 15 - Varrock * Staff Shop 16 - Al-Kharid Skirt Shop 17 - Al-Kharid Crafting Shop 18 - * Al-Kharid General Store 19 - Al-Kharid Leg Shop 20 - Al-Kharid Scimitar * Shop 21 - Lumbridge Axe Shop 22 - Lumbridge General Store 23 - Port Sarim * Battleaxe Shop 24 - Port Sarim Magic Shop 25 - Port Sarim Jewelery Shop * 26 - Port Sarim Fishing Shop 27 - Port Sarim Food Shop 28 - Rimmington * Crafting Shop 29 - Rommington Archery Shop 30 - Npc's around and in * varrock 31 - Npc's at Rellekka 32 - Npc's around and in lumbridge 33 - 34 - * 35 - 36 - 37 - 38 - 39 - 40 - */
Now for example Aubury (Shop Id 1) NPC id is 553, So you would open up Client.Java and search for

if(NPCID == 553){

You’ll see something like this

if(NPCID == 553){ if(q2 == 0){ NpcDialogue = 21; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Change the “553” To the NPC Id you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Talking to a NPC
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:348805”]Erm do you want him to actually say something or straight open the shop?
If so call the sendDialogue through the click packet; otherwise just make him open it through wanneshop or w/e it’s called.[/quote]
Im trying to get it so when i click on him it opens up the shop…
thx

Read full topic

item.title: Talking to a NPC
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Erm do you want him to actually say something or straight open the shop?
If so call the sendDialogue through the click packet; otherwise just make him open it through wanneshop or w/e it’s called.

Read full topic
